#API Call

###todo: append variables to api url

```{r}
Pums_API_Query <- function(year=2022, num_variables =c("AGEP","PWGTP"),cat_variables="SEX",geography="All",Opt_subset){
  #Automatically capitalize our numeric and categorical arguments
  num_variables<-toupper(num_variables)
  cat_variables<-toupper(cat_variables)
  #Base URL w/ Year for API Call
  base_pums_url <-paste("https://api.census.gov/data/",year,"/acs/acs1/pums",sep="")
  #Year Range Check
  if (year < 2010 | year > 2022){
    stop("Invalid Year.  Acceptable year range: 2010-2022.")}
  #Just a test: delete when complete
  paste(base_pums_url)
  print(num_variables)
  print(cat_variables)
}
```

Showing exception cases:
```{r}
Pums_API_Query(2009)
Pums_API_Query(2012)  
```
